modules.name: godot-tools
build-commands:
scons platform=x11 \
                     CCFLAGS=-I/app/include \
                     prefix=/app \
                     unix_global_settings_path=/app \
                     -j `nproc` \
                     target=release_debug \
                     use_lto=no \
                     builtin_freetype=no \
                     builtin_libogg=no \
                     builtin_libpng=no \
                     builtin_libtheora=no \
                     builtin_libvorbis=no \
                     builtin_libwebp=no \
                     builtin_openssl=no \
                     builtin_libvpx=no \
                     builtin_zlib=no \
                     udev=no \
                     debug_symbols=no \
                     progress=no

modules.name: godot-release-template
build-commands:
scons platform=x11 \
                     CCFLAGS=-I/app/include \
                     prefix=/app \
                     unix_global_settings_path=/app \
                     -j `nproc` \
                     tools=no \
                     target=release \
                     use_lto=no \
                     builtin_freetype=no \
                     builtin_libogg=no \
                     builtin_libpng=no \
                     builtin_libtheora=no \
                     builtin_libvorbis=no \
                     builtin_libwebp=no \
                     builtin_openssl=no \
                     builtin_libvpx=no \
                     builtin_zlib=no \
                     udev=no \
                     debug_symbols=no \
                     progress=no
